programmes.show_description: Artist Matthew palmer will be painting watercolour live this hour. Join him for some amazing book deals and exclusive watercolour products.
Keith is back with his unique blend of quality, quantity and fun! Make the most of your all day P&P of only £4.95 and fill your baskets!
The time has come for Carnation Crafts to say goodbye to their 2020 releases and make way for all the amazing new things to come. Enjoy half-price deals on a range of die sets!

Beautifully coordinated, ready-to-use fabric bundles that take the cutting out of quilting. These time-saving essentials make it easy to start stitching projects straight away!
...Quilt: Jennie Rayment is here demonstrating this traditionally inspired quilt, featuring iconic prints from the William Morris Bedford Park Collection.
Jane Greenoff brings us an hour of beautiful Cross Stitch Guild Kits.

programmes.show_name: Pick a Pocket or Four Bag
programmes.show_description: Pick a Pocket or Four is a new bag pattern from Jennie Rayment, where she will be demonstrating how to use FQ's to create these beautiful bags.
Discover the creative possibilities of Brother Embroidery Machines - designed to bring beautiful stitched designs, lettering, and personalised details to life with ease.
Anne-Marie introduces Floral Wreaths - beautifully detailed designs made for crafters who love creating elegant, layered projects.
Mark is back with his latest collection, Grunge Florals! Packed with cardmaking, mixed media, art journalling and scrapbooking inspiration in his signature grunge style.
Tune in for the new Duo Design Paper Pads with Anne-Marie. These 8" x 8" pads are perfect for a variety of projects, offering double-sided designs that vary in pattern and colour.
Discover Electric Ink Designs' unique digital downloads of stylish and edgy art stamps designed by Carley Duff. Perfect for a range of craft projects.
